org.meganekkovr

クラス Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.meganekkovr.Component
  • 直系の既知のサブクラス:
    CameraComponent, GeometryComponent, LookDetectorComponent, SurfaceRendererComponent

    public abstract class Component
extends java.lang.Object
    Component is a basic class in Meganekko. It attaches some actions or behaviors to Entity.

    • コンストラクタのサマリー

      コンストラクタ 
      コンストラクタと説明
      Component() 

    • メソッドのサマリー

      すべてのメソッド インスタンス・メソッド concreteメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      Entity getEntity()
      Get attached Entity.
      boolean isAttached() 
      void onAttach(Entity entity)
      Called when this is attached to Entity.
      void onDetach(Entity entity)
      Called when this is detached from Entity.
      void update(FrameInput frame)
      Called on every frame update.

      • クラスから継承されたメソッド java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • Component

        public Component()

    • メソッドの詳細

      • onAttach

        public void onAttach(Entity entity)
        Called when this is attached to Entity.
        パラメータ:
        entity - Entity

      • onDetach

        public void onDetach(Entity entity)
        Called when this is detached from Entity.
        パラメータ:
        entity - Detached Entity

      • update

        public void update(FrameInput frame)
        Called on every frame update. About 60 times per second.
        パラメータ:
        frame - Frame information.

      • getEntity

        public Entity getEntity()
        Get attached Entity.
        戻り値:
        Entity which is attached to this Component.

      • isAttached

        public boolean isAttached()
        戻り値:
        true if attached.
